alternative_titles.en: Will Jumping to Conclusions Never Do Good?

synopsis:
Kanou, a care worker, and Mushanokouji, a nurse, are close friends because not only are they the same age, they are also the only two men in their female-dominated workplace. One day, construction work began in Kanou's neighborhood and since he works the night shift, he hasn't been able to rest well when he gets off work. Mushanokouji then offered Kanou to stay at his place, which Kanou gladly accepted, and thus began their one week of cohabitation.

In that time, not only did Mushanokouji provide Kanou a bed, he also made Kanou meals, did his laundry and also made bento for him. Finding it admirable that Mushanokouji has been taking care of him so well, Kanou thinks back on the time the former had jokingly proposed to him and...

"Don't tell me that he actually likes me..."

Now that he is aware of this, Kanou can't help but start becoming conscious of Mushanokouji!

An honest and simple care worker x an excellent and cool nurse. Their love keeps spiraling as they continue jumping to conclusions!

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)

title: Haiiro no Jūjika
synopsis: With Haiiro no Juujika, Tetsuo Aoki signs a poignant collection on the daily life of the involuntary actors of the pacific war. Passionate about historical narratives, the author uses memory to present, in its most raw truth, the throes of war. through a staggering staging, a deeply human trait, he becomes the mouthpiece of the anonymous witnesses of this conflict. it is thus several characters who tell us their story here, with their hopes, their doubts and their thirst for truth. young men and women wrenched from their certainties, seeking to regain control of their lives. whether we call ourselves "friend" or "enemy", we are only twigs blown away by the violent winds of war.

title: Souri Club
synopsis:
Compared to his handsome and athletic twin brother, high school student Daigo Hinata has no talents and does not excel at anything in particular. His uneventful life takes a turn when a well-dressed man whisks him away to the Japanese Diet—a location at the heart of the country's political action. While trying to understand his purpose there, he receives a special key that grants him access to a beautiful space underneath the Diet.

The secret place is home to the mysterious Prime Minister Club—a group consisting of Japanese prime ministers from eras gone by. The unskilled Daigo learns that he is now a club member and will be the next Prime Minister of Japan! He insists that there is no way someone as plain as him will attain such a position, but under the guidance of former prime ministers, Daigo slowly finds himself training to become the succeeding leader of the nation.

From the creator of Hetalia: Axis Powers, Souri Club puts a comedic spin on both Japanese political history and Meiji-era prime ministers.

title: My Childhood Friend Became an Obsessive Husband
synopsis:
She was sold to a monster duke with lower body problems. But the only way to not be offered to the nobility was to become a married woman. For a moment, Isabel remembered her childhood friend Ricks, who had no interest in love.

"So Ricks, marry me. If I become a married woman, they will reject me."
"...Why do you hate Duke Cardiego so much?"
"Other things are fine. But he's a tyrant? It's okay to live a difficult life. But if you do something wrong, you'll be killed? With that, there's no problem. Acceptable."

Ricks suddenly resentful and frustrated to the point of madness.

***

A few days later, Duke Cardiego, a recluse, arrived at the temple. The most surprising thing, of course, was that Isabel learned of her childhood friend's background.

"Isabel, marry me. You're the one who proposed first, so there's no right to refuse. Anyway, among all the boys nearby, I'm the closest to your ideal type."
"Ideal type?"
"Don't you know your ideal type? You like tall, handsome men who smell like soap at night and dress simply"
"...."
"Anything, I can do it. So marry me."

Although she knows everything about her childhood friend, it seems he had changed a bit after getting married.

"Ricks, slowly......"
"It's slow enough now, isn't it?"
"I never thought you'd be in such a hurry."
When Isabel spoke as if begging, Rick smiled and replied, "It was you then, now it's 'my husband.'"

(Source: Feelyeon Management, translated)

"Hyogan Komako" was serialized in September 1957 to August the following year in the magazine "Middleware".

In any case, because it is not accustomed to the civilization society, it causes various troubles, but the temperament is gentle and strong. Besides it is beautiful. We will overcome various difficulties with unique wisdom that makes good use of things around us and sturdiness like wild children.
Currently it is a cartoon that everyone is enjoying, but in the 50's where this "gourd candy" was drawn, it seems that cartoons targeting young people like these college students were unusual. As it is in the postscript, Tezuka Osamu seems to have trial and error, and works are also found in various places in the work.
First of all, a unique framework with a black border like a movie screen. It is not only merely thickened the edge of the frame, it is anomalous for every frame, and it has a magical effect on the screen. Also, gags based on current affairs story that sometimes come out are tastes that could not be seen in boys' comics etc.
The story is a nonsense butterfly drama played hard here and there, followed by a love story with Sampei, an aspiring actor, a conspiracy of Snakezuka playing Ham Egg, and former lover / gorillo who followed Komago from Antarctica, but finally The casually criticized message is put in place is still Tezuka cartoon.

title: Love☆Me☆Baby
synopsis:
Second-year high-school student Taeko fell in love with Kanno-sensei at first sight. She's finally mustered the courage to confess to her beloved sensei.

Love-note in hand, Taeko overhears Kanno-sensei being congratulated on his wedding—and his already pregnant bride. Taeko is in shock; she shaped her whole world around Kanno-sensei and now it's all over!

Her childhood friend Shin just seems happy to pour fuel on her fire. Taeko lurches from one disaster to another. And every time her plans are ruined Shin seems to be involved. She aches to tell sensei how she really feels. But will Kanno-sensei even care?

(Source: MU)

title: kitsune no ongaeshi
synopsis: Haku, a 500 year old immortal kitsune, has went to go repay a favor to a boy who had previously saved her life when she was in danger.

alternative_titles.ja: 片翼のミケランジェロ

title: Tokyo Deka
synopsis: Kagami Kazuya is a 20-year-old rookie cop and former gang leader, bringing his own form of justice to the stuffy ranks of the police.

title: Salyune
synopsis: Salyune, by Hashimoto Ikumi and Sarashina Mizuho, is a short, sweet science fiction story.

title: Potion Uri no Shounen: Kare no Potion wa Jitsu wa Nandemo Naosu Densetsu no Elixir deshita

alternative_titles.ja: ポーション売りの少年 ～彼のポーションは実はなんでも治す伝説のエリクサーでした～

synopsis:
Ceel was a boy who made and sold potions used to treat light wounds and colds. However, unbeknownst to him, they were actually no mere potions, but the legendary elixir that can cure all wounds and illness. One day, he came across a noble girl who had trouble walking as she was so out of breath. Apparently, she had an illness which herbalists, doctors and even magicians couldn’t cure, but she recovered fully from Ceel’s potion. His potions became popular overnight, with adventurers and nobles fighting to get ahold of it. A new chapter of the kind-hearted boy’s life begins with his accidental elixir creation—.

(Source: Shueisha, translated)

title: Oyaji! Arisawa-san'chi no Hanashi
synopsis:
At the young age of 30, Arisawa Riku was already an obstinate father. But did being raised strictly send his high school-aged son, Tomoki, down the path of homosexuality?! “I forbid it, Tomoki!” However, Tomoki and Naoya-sempai will fight for the sake of their love! This theatrical romance takes place in the noisy living room of the Arisawa household.
(from Blissful Sin)

title: NIGHTCLUB TO YURI OKAMI

alternative_titles.ja: ナイトクラブと百合女将

synopsis: In the red-light district of a bustling city, three nightclub owners are forced to take drastic measures to protect their reputation once a scammer appears in their midst. In the countryside, the proprietress of a hot-spring resort alleviates the loneliness of a guest whose vacation is at risk of being ruined by a recent breakup. What do these four women have in common? They'll do anything to put a smile on their customers' faces! (source: irodori comics)

title: Ginshousui
synopsis:
Laureen is in love with Wiza, a young noble residing at the palace. The young prince of the castle, Gideon, is also in love with him. But as Wiza doesn't show any interest in him, he is exiled by Gideon...

(Source: KaréManga, translated)

title: Hatsukoi Monogatari
synopsis:
Aratsuka Kaoru, a math sensei teaching in an all boys’ middle and high school boarding school, is also known as “Alaska” because of his coldness. He has never been in love before because he’s afraid to share his feelings with another. After some issues, he spent a night in the room of the infirmary sensei, Suzuki Kouta. It was the first time someone touched him. What will happen there after?

(from Attractive Fascinante)

title: Sabishigariya no Egoist

alternative_titles.ja: 淋しがりやのエゴイスト

synopsis:
Minami has gotten a hot start as a young interior designer. In fact, he's just been chosen as the primary designer of a new luxury hotel. When Minami enthusiastically goes out to meet his client, Asakura, the hotel owner turns out to be a dazzling, sexy man. On top of that, the overwhelmed Minami finds his contract is actually for a love hotel! Seeing as how Minami lacks experience in this particular area, Asakura promises to show him the ropes. But is it really necessary to try out ALL the beds...?!

(Source: DMP)

synopsis: Setsuna Rei has a special tattoo on the palm of his hand that allows him to go back in time and change history.  He uses this special power to earn his living.  For a fee he will go back in time to change the course of history for a client.

title: Aishiteru dewa Omosugite

alternative_titles.ja: 愛してるでは重すぎて

synopsis:
Being in the shadow of his magnificent and famous father, second-generation actor Shou suffers from a great inferiority complex. One day, Shou meets Souma, another young actor who didn’t finish his studies in high school due to dedicating himself to his acting career, for which he feels overwhelmed to discover the difference of preparation at the level of acting they have. Meanwhile, Souma can't hide the anger he feels because he believes that Shou is favored by the environment that surrounds him and entered the entertainment world thanks to contacts, but when did those feelings change?

(Source: Libre, translated)

title: Chuuken Kunshu
synopsis:
Katou is a member of the high school swim club. Matsuoka has come to bring him lunch and use Katou as his stress relief punching bag yet again. To the sympathy of his club mates, impulsive Katou totally falls for him, saying with a shy smile that Matsuoka is cute… Even as Katou treats Matsuoka kindly and tells him that he loves him, Matsuoka remains a total tsundere, leaving doubts to linger in his heart!
(from Boys On Boys Love)

title: The Newlywed Diary of a Witch and a Dragon

synonyms: The Newlywed Life of a Witch and a Dragon
alternative_titles.en: The Newlywed Diary of a Witch and a Dragon

synopsis:
After watching the man who holds her affections walk down the aisle with another woman, Wendy Blanchett bids farewell to the love she had locked deep within her heart. One drunken mistake later, she wakes up naked in bed with Aiden Winters, the newest trainee at the Tower of Magic.

As his superior, Wendy is aghast at what she has done, offering to make it up to Aiden in any way possible. She is certain that he will only ask for money or a promotion—but against all expectations, Aiden demands that Wendy take responsibility for her actions by marrying him! Thus begins the tenuous relationship between a witch and her subordinate; however, unbeknownst to Wendy, Aiden is hiding a secret about his shockingly primeval nature.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]

title: Jumping Over
synopsis:
Social outcast Yeonhui dreams of fitting in with her schoolmates. But her social status doesn't seem like it's going to change anytime soon—until an alien named I-an falls out of the sky and crashes into her hopeless life. He helps her transform herself, and she ends up in an exciting love triangle. Will Yeonhui choose I-an, the alien who helped her learn the true meaning of happiness, or Hanje, the human boy who has been secretly protecting her before I-an appeared in her life?

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)

title: Unjou Roukaku Kidan
synopsis:
Kasumi was given a name favored by the gods so she would always be protected. Yet, when there is a drought in her village, she's the one chosen as the human sacrifice to go to beg the gods for rain. Her parents are sad, but Kasumi goes anyway. When she gets to the heavens, they try to send her back, but she won't go until her village sees rain, and now she's determined to become a fairy of the heavens. If it'll take 1000 years to learn to ride the clouds, she knows she'd better start now!

(Source: MU)

title: Itoshii Kimi
synopsis:
A collection of 3 one-shots by Suetsugu Yuki all sharing the common theme of summer love between high school students.

July:
Sumitomo Ayumi has had a secret crush on Narazaki-kun for 2 years and has finally mustered up the courage to tell him, but just as she is about to confess her feelings, she finds out that he is suddenly going to move away...

August:
Mizuki Chihaya chose to concentrate in the sciences at her high school, which made her 1 of only 4 girls in her homeroom class.  Teased and harassed by the boys, she is miserable.  If it weren't for Kuonji-kun, her classmate from middle school, it would be unbearable...

September:
Fujio Chitose has been shamelessly going after her big time crush Takasuga-senpai of the soccer team, when suddenly, he assents to being her boyfriend.  Her long-time dream has finally come true, right?

Kiyoshi Koyama, a first-year high school boy, is a very big fan of VTubers. One day, he fell asleep while illustrating a VTuber character after class. His illustration was seen by Nene Otogawa, one of his classmates. She admired his work and wanted to become a VTuber as well. Otogawa requested Koyama to draw a model for her. He initially rejected, but then accepted at last.

(Source: MU, edited)

title: Netorare Reijou no Ouji-sama

alternative_titles.ja: 寝取られ令嬢の王子様

synopsis:
"Who would want a damaged woman?" Lady Celestia Dalton loved her fiancé, William, with all her heart. Until he cheated on her, that is. Surprisingly, it's Celestia who finds herself shunned by high society. Now known as "The Betrayed Woman," she finds herself alone in her grief until she meets someone new—a charismatic, handsome man who wants nothing more than her hand in marriage!

(Source: Comikey Media)

synopsis:
With the Demon King defeated, the world is at peace once more... And with that peace, the hero's party's handyman Theodore is out of a job. With all the money he could ever need already tucked away, he considers retiring. But he's instead suddenly called on to investigate the New World! En route to his new destination, he comes across and tames a slightly offbeat juvenile dragon. And so, Theodore's life on the frontier begins! His busted trio of skills, Appraise, Craft, and Tame are all he needs in his lackadaisical cultivation efforts, surrounded by a bizarrely cute crew!

(Source: Square Enix)

Anzu joins Sunlight, an entertainment agency as a part-timer. There in front of her appear a host of ikemen who are an actor, voice actor, singer, comedian and a host!

synonyms: ONI: Sora to Kaze no Aika Episode Zero

alternative_titles.ja: ONI 空と風の哀歌〈エレジー〉 Episode Zero

synopsis:
Shueisha Games & Clouded Leopard Entertainment are proud to introduce a new limited edition manga based on the upcoming game! Oni: Road to be the Mightiest Oni is a bold adaptation of Momotaro, the Japanese fairytale about a young warrior who travels to Demon Island to confront the Oni (demons or ogres) who terrorize the countryside. ONI dares to look at the other side of this seminal story through the eyes of a diminutive Oni and question the true meaning of justice in a world where humans and monsters live together.

(Source: MANGA Plus)

title: Kill the Dragon
synopsis: The human race plunged into a war against dragons, who have invaded the earth! At the same time, among the humans arose people with supernatural powers, called psykers. Through the countless sacrifices of psykers, the war seemed to be coming to an end with the human race as the victors. But when a psyker with the ability to see the future foretold that the dragons will be returning in 15 years, the people established Ark, a facility to train children born with psychic abilities to prepare for the last war of the human race. There are only three years remaining until the prophesized war. What will happen next?!

alternative_titles.ja: お母さん、なんちゃって女子校生

title: Isekai Yuusha Mizuki
synopsis: The story of a completely ordinary girl who gets summoned into another world to become its hero.

title: Manabiya Ouji
synopsis:
Lina is an honor student on a mission to be perfect, and all's going well... until the free-spirited Prince Gigi transfers into her class.

(Source: Kokoro no Oasis)

alternative_titles.ja: 雷塚さんは微動だにしない

title: Tetsu-san wa Warawanai
synopsis:
Kokoro Kurogane is a beautiful and hard-working perfectionist known for her icy personality. Always arriving at the exact same time every morning and completely dedicating herself to her work, she is admired... no, rather feared, in the office. 

One day, a handsome heartthrob, called Tohno Takaomi, transfers to the office after working abroad in America. He is intrigued by Kokoro, who is secretly known as the "strict" and "impossible to read" "Ms. Ironheart" by her colleagues. He tries to get close to her, despite the barriers she's put in place, but this unexpected attention is throwing her perfect system out of whack!

title: Joshidaisei no Senpai: Yonhaku Itsuka no Inwaku Ryokou

alternative_titles.ja: 女子大生の先輩 ~四泊五日の淫惑旅行~

title: The Extra Is Too Strong
synopsis:
I received the same question every day, but the answer never changed. The only things I had left were sympathetic gazes and the monthly insurance payments. And the cruel reality of being half-paralyzed. They say that God only gives you trials you can endure, but I would rather have died. That was when I woke up.

[This is the world of the "Magician Who Dominates the World."]
[From now on, you must live as the character "Mord Vernars."]

I became an extra in the novel I was reading overnight.

(Source: Kakao Entertainment Corp., translated)
